pages.title: Wait. You're HOT?
pages.text: $(bold)How.$()$(br2)The sun has abandoned you. The oceans are frozen. And you have somehow managed to give yourself $(bold)heat stroke.$()$(br2)The ORSA Wellness Division did not prepare a pamphlet for this. We are improvising.$(br2)$(italic)Brought to you by the people who told you "just build more heaters." We accept no liability.$()

pages.title: How Did We Get Here?
pages.text: Heat sources $(bold)stack$() in Frozen Dawn. Every heater, campfire, lava pool, and geothermal core adds its warmth together.$(br2)One heater? Cozy.$(br)Two heaters? Toasty.$(br)Eight diamond heaters? $(bold)You are an oven.$()$(br2)If the HUD number is red with three digits, reconsider your life choices.

pages.title: Stage 1: "Sweating?"
pages.text: At $(bold)60°C+$(), your body is confused. It spent all week freezing and now it's being slow-roasted.$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Weakness I$() — Weaker attacks$(li)No damage yet$(br2)The screen tints slightly orange. This is the game judging you.$(br2)$(italic)ORSA Tip: This is a sign to stop. You will not stop. We know.$()

pages.title: Stage 2: "Medium-Rare"
pages.text: At $(bold)90°C+$(), you have crossed from "warm" into "medium-rare."$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Weakness II$(li)$(bold)1 heart of damage$() every 2 seconds$(br2)90°C is the temperature at which you poach an egg. You are now the egg.$(br2)$(italic)The orange overlay is getting worse. Those are sweat drips.$()

pages.title: Stage 3: "I Am Cooked"
pages.text: At $(bold)120°C+$(), you have achieved the internal temperature of a sous vide steak.$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Nausea$() — Vision swims$(li)$(bold)Slowness II$(li)$(bold)2 hearts of damage$() every 2 seconds$(br2)You survived the death of the sun only to be done in by your own heaters. Poetic.

pages.title: The Armor Problem
pages.text: Your $(bold)insulated armor$() — the gear keeping you alive in the cold — also $(bold)traps heat.$()$(br2)$(li)Insulated: $(bold)+20%$() heat above 20°C$(li)Heated: $(bold)+40%$() heat above 20°C$(li)EVA suit: Only $(bold)+8%$() (proper cooling)$(br2)That cozy 80°C room? In heated armor, it's $(bold)104°C.$(br2)$(italic)The armor was designed for cold. Not for standing inside a furnace.$()

pages.title: How to Not Die (of Heat)
pages.text: $(bold)1.$() Remove some heaters. Yes, the ones you spent all game building.$(br2)$(bold)2.$() Spread them out. Cluster = death sauna.$(br2)$(bold)3.$() Take off the armor indoors.$(br2)$(bold)4.$() Do NOT stand between a Geothermal Core and four Diamond Heaters. Kevin tried this. He sends regards from the burn ward on Mars.
